description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the clipboard virtual channel extension remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-38131):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates for your Windows version from the provided links.
2. Ensure that your system is running one of the supported build versions as listed below:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2
   - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems and 32-bit Systems.
3. Restart your system after the installation to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves remote code execution vulnerabilities associated with the clipboard virtual channel extension.
- For manual installation, use the following update packages based on your OS version:
  - [KB5041782](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041782)
  - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
  - [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure compatibility with the specified Windows versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
